function.name: search_wikipedia
function.description: Search the Wikipedia with given query. The `key` field in the response is the Wikipedia page name. Uses network.

query.description: The search terms in the language matching the second parameter.

language.description: Language code matching the search query. For example, `en` for English or `pl` for Polish.

function.name: get_wikipedia
function.description: Retrieve the Wikipedia article on given subject. Uses network.

function.name: get_dictionary
function.description: Retrieve description of a word from dictionary. Uses network.

function.name: search_web
function.description: Search the web with given query. Uses network.

function.name: get_webpage
function.description: Fetch contents of a web page at given URL. Uses network.

function.name: user_manual
function.description: Search the Tracy Profiler user manual with given query.

query.description: Verbose search query in English language.

function.name: source_file
function.description: Retrieve the user program source file contents around given line.

context.description: How many lines to get after the target line. Default: 2.

context_back.description: How many lines to get before the target line. Default: 2.

function.name: source_search
function.description: Search user program source files for given keyword.
